text: @Jim_Jordan You stupid fucking twit. Testing is precisely a failure that has contributed immensely to us being in this predicament, and the Trump Administration is at the center of the failure. And StupidJim, we were not successful. Coronavirus is not gone. We're nowhere near back-to normal.
